title: LAS VEGAS "FONDLE OR CARESS" CRIME STATISTICS

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: LAS VEGAS "FONDLE OR CARESS" CRIME STATISTICS
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting raw crime statistics concerning two (2) Las Vegas city ordinances:

(1) Las Vegas municipal code (LVMC) 6.06B.090(I) involving Adult Nightclub regulations
(2) Las Vegas municipal code (LVMC) 6.35.100(I) involving Erotic Dance Establishment regulations

specifically raw numerical data including ALL alleged “fondle or caress” violations pursuant to LVMC 6.06B.090(I) and LVMC 6.35.100(I) since the ordinances were enacted in 1995.

PLEASE PROVIDE THE FOLLOWING DATA:
-------------------------------------------------------
(1) I request the exact number of citations/tickets/charges issued by the Las Vegas Metro Police EACH YEAR for alleged violations of LVMC 6.06B.090(I). I request the number of such alleged violations for EACH YEAR from 1995 to 2022.

(2) I request the exact number of citations/tickets/charges issued by the Las Vegas Metro Police EACH YEAR for alleged violations of LVMC 6.35.100(I). I request the number of such alleged violations for EACH YEAR from 1995 to 2022.

I am specifically not requesting that any new record(s) be created, but specifically do request raw data (public record crime statistics) in an electronic format be provided by means of an electronic medium. No confidential information is requested.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

James Colin
